1.name: Zealot’s Speed
1.desc: Create a Symbol of Wrath when you are struck while below the health threshold (50%)

2.name: Symbolic Exposure
2.desc: Symbols apply vulnerability to foes.

3.name: Symbolic Power
3.desc: Symbols have increased damage and a chance to burn enemies.

1.name: Wrathful Spirit
1.desc: Aegis give retaliation when it ends.

2.name: Fiery Wrath
2.desc: Increases 10% damage against burning foes.

3.name: Zealous Scepter
3.desc: Gain might when your justice passive effect triggers, while wielding a scepter

1.name: Binding Jeopardy
1.desc: Immobilizing or blinding a foe also applies vulnerability to them.

2.name: Zealous Blade
2.desc: Attacks with your greatsword deal 5% extra damage and heal you. Greatsword abilities have reduced recharge.

3.name: Kindled Zeal
3.desc: Gain 13% condition damage based on your power.

1.name: Expeditious Spirit
1.desc: Spirit weapons burn foes they strike. Spirit weapons summon and command skills recharge 20% faster.

2.name: Shattered Aegis
2.desc: When an aegis you applied is removed, it damages nearby foes.

3.name: Symbolic Avenger
3.desc: You deal 20% more damage to enemies standing in your symbols

1.name: Justice is Blind
1.desc: When activating Virtue of Justice, nearby foes are blinded

2.name: Renewed Justice
2.desc: Virtue of Justice is renewed when you kill a foe.

3.name: Radiant Power
3.desc: Attacks against burning foes have an increased chance (25%) to critically hit.

1.name: Healer’s Retribution
1.desc: Gain retaliation when using a heal skill.

2.name: Inner Fire
2.desc: Gain Fury when you strike a foe that has burning stacks over the threshold (3).

3.name: Right-Hand Strength
3.desc: Critical-hit chance with one-handed weapon is increased by 15%. Sword skills recharge 20% faster.

1.name: Wrath of Justice
1.desc: Striking an enemy with Justice’s active effect triggers Signet of Wrath

2.name: Retribution
2.desc: Gain 10% increased damage while under the effects of retaliation

3.name: Radiant Fire
3.desc: Gain Zealot’s Flame when you critically hit. Burning duration is increased 20%. Torch abilities recharge 20% faster.

1.name: Amplified Wrath
1.desc: Burning damage is increased by 33%. Burn enemies whose attacks you block.

2.name: Perfect Inscriptions
2.desc: Gain light aura when activating a signet. Signets recharge 20% faster and have 20% improved passive effects.

3.name: Radiant Retaliation
3.desc: Retaliation damage scales from condition damage instead of power.

1.name: Valorous Defense
1.desc: Gain aegis when you are struck while below the health threshold (50%)

2.name: Courageous Return
2.desc: Virtue of Courage is recharged when you resurrect an ally or rally.

3.name: Might of the Protector
3.desc: Gain might when you block an attack.

1.name: Strength of the Fallen
1.desc: Lose conditions at a set time interval (10s). Health degenerates 33% slower while downed.

2.name: Smiter’s Boon
2.desc: Smite Conditions when you use a healing ability.

3.name: Focus Mastery
3.desc: Gain protection when using a focus ability. Focus abilities have 20% reduced recharge.

1.name: Stalwart Defender
1.desc: Gain 180 additional toughness while wielding a shield. Shield ability recharge is reduced by 20%.

2.name: Strength in Numbers
2.desc: Nearby allies gain toughness based on your effective level.

3.name: Communal Defenses
3.desc: Grant aegis to allies when you block an attack.

1.name: Altruistic Healing
1.desc: Applying a boon to allies heals you.

2.name: Monk’s Focus
2.desc: Using a meditation skill heals you and grant fury to allies in a radius. Meditation skills have reduced recharge.

3.name: Retributive Armor
3.desc: Gain toughness for a period of time when blocking an attack. Gain 15% ferocity based on your toughness.

1.name: Vigorous Precision
1.desc: Gain vigor when you deliver a critical hit.

2.name: Selfless Daring
2.desc: The end of your dodge roll heals nearby allies.

3.name: Purity of Body
3.desc: Your Virtue of Resolve passive effect also regenerates endurance.

1.name: Invigorated Bulwark
1.desc: Gain increased healing power for a period of time each time you block an attack while wielding a mace. Stacks up to 10 times. Mace abilities have reduced recharge.

2.name: Protective Reviver
2.desc: Activate Shield of Absorption when you begin reviving an ally. When you successfully revive an ally, you both gain aegis, protection and regeneration.

3.name: Protector’s Impact
3.desc: Create a Symbol of Protection when you take falling damage. You take 50% less damage when falling.

1.name: Honorable Staff
1.desc: Boon duration is increased while wielding a staff. Staff recharges are reduced by 20%.

2.name: Pure of Heart
2.desc: Aegis heals when it blocks an attack.

3.name: Empowering Might
3.desc: You and nearby allies gain might when you land a critical hit.

1.name: Pure of Voice
1.desc: Allies affected by shouts have conditions converted to boons. Shout abilities have their recharge reduced by 20%.

2.name: Writ of Persistence
2.desc: Symbols last longer, are larger, and heal allies.

3.name: Force of Will
3.desc: You have 300 increased vitality. Healing effectiveness to other allies is increased based on 10% of your vitality.

1.name: Inspired Virtue
1.desc: Virtues now also apply the following boons to allies when activate: Justice might. Resolve: regeneration. Courage: protection.

2.name: Virtue of Retribution
2.desc: Gain retaliation when you activate a Virtue. Retaliation you apply also lasts longer.

3.name: Power of the Virtuous
3.desc: Deal 1% extra damage for each boon you have. Virtues recharge 15% faster.

1.name: Unscathed Contender
1.desc: Deal 20% more damage while under the effects of aegis.

2.name: Retaliatory Subconscious
2.desc: Gain retaliation and aegis whenever you are disabled.

3.name: Master of Consecrations
3.desc: Consecrations last 20% longer and have 20% reduced recharge.

1.name: Supreme Justice
1.desc: Virtue of Justice causes burning more frequently. When activating Virtue of Justice, the burn duration is increased.

2.name: Absolute Precision
2.desc: Activating Virtue of Resolve removes conditions from nearby allies. Virtue of Resolve’s passive effect is stronger.

3.name: Virtuous Mallet
3.desc: Hammer attacks have a 33% chance to slow enemies. Hammer abilities have reduced recharge.

1.name: Permeating Wrath
1.desc: Virtue of Justice’s passive effect no longer burns your target, but instead burns the area an area around you each time it activates.

2.name: Battle Presence
2.desc: Nearby allies gain Virtue of Resolve’s passive effect.

3.name: Indomitable Courage
3.desc: Activating Virtue of Courage breaks stun and grants stability to affected allies. Virtue of Courage’s passive effect triggers more frequently.

1.name: Virtuous Action
1.desc: The Guardian's resolve has further increased, allowing virtues to be manifested as physical aspects.

2.name: Defender's Dogma
2.desc: Blocking an attack causes justice to reach its maximum charge.

3.name: Pure of Sight
3.desc: Deal bonus damage to enemies beyond the range threshold.

1.name: Piercing Light
1.desc: Trap hits bleed enemies.

2.name: Zealot's Aggression
2.desc: Deal extra damage to crippled enemies.

3.name: Soaring Devastation
3.desc: Wings of resolve deliver an attack upon landing.

1.name: Hunter's Determination
1.desc: True shot grants stability for each enemy struck.

2.name: Bulwark
2.desc: Shield of courage is larger and lasts longer.

3.name: Dulled Senses
3.desc: Enemies you knock back are crippled.

1.name: Hunter's Fortification
1.desc: Apply protection in an area when activating a virtue.

2.name: Heavy Light
2.desc: Longbow arrows knock back when enemies are within the range threshold.

3.name: Big Game Hunter
3.desc: Striking an enemy tethered by your spear of justice causes vulnerability and increases damage dealt.
